sentence: Cinco estudiantes de la UPCT asisten del 6 al 11 de noviembre en Riga (Letonia) al Communication Lab.
translation: Five students from UPCT attend the Communication Lab in Riga (Latvia) from November 6th to 11th.

sentence: junto a otros 15 jóvenes procedentes de las universidades que forman parte del proyecto Success: la Technical University de Dresde, la Technical University de Riga y la Pôle Universitaire Léonard de Vinci de París.
translation: along with 15 other young people from universities that are part of the Success project: the Technical University of Dresden, the Technical University of Riga, and the Pôle Universitaire Léonard de Vinci in Paris.

sentence: Durante esos días, los estudiantes realizarán un programa formativo en el que entrenarán una herramienta digital de comunicación para practicar las habilidades comunicativas en inglés para ingenieros.
translation: During those days, the students will carry out a training program in which they will train on a digital communication tool to practice communication skills in English for engineers.

sentence: Tres de los estudiantes seleccionados son del grado en Ingeniería Biomédica, uno de Telemática y uno de Sistemas de Telecomunicación.
translation: Three of the selected students are from the Biomedical Engineering program, one from Telematics, and one from Telecommunication Systems.

sentence: El proyecto SUCCESS (Solutions for Unified Communication Competences for Engineering Students and Specialists), está cofinanciado con fondos europeos en el marco del programa Erasmus+.
translation: The SUCCESS project (Solutions for Unified Communication Competences for Engineering Students and Specialists) is co-financed with European funds under the Erasmus+ program.

sentence: En este proyecto participan los investigadores de la UPCT Natalia Carbajosa Palmero, Antonio José Fornet Vivancos, Camino Rea Rizzo y Rafael Toledo Moreo.
translation: In this project, researchers from UPCT Natalia Carbajosa Palmero, Antonio José Fornet Vivancos, Camino Rea Rizzo, and Rafael Toledo Moreo participate.

sentence: El proyecto ha sido diseñado en el seno de la European University of Technology y en él participa otra universidad socia de la UPCT en EUt+, la Technical University of Riga.
translation: The project has been designed within the European University of Technology and another partner university of UPCT in EUt+ participates, the Technical University of Riga.
